title: 098 - Movie Theaters ARE BACK From The Dead
description: On today's show, the boys chat about Tony getting fleeced by a cat burglar and what he's been doing to make sure his identity doesn't get stolen, Nick and Gumpy recap their weekend of painting Nick's house, and the two of them had issues with the way Zito was painting, while Zito claims that Nick served him slop after a hard day's work. Plus the guys dive into the Pod FOD that includes what the undisputed king of soup is, MOVIE THEATERS BEING BACK FROM THE DEAD as their stock prices are shooting through the roof with news that a COVID vaccine may be around the corner, a man who has to try and not poop all day, what the guys would do if they had to pick another job for just one day, they try to pick the top Little Debbie snack, and much more. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow
dc:creator: The Pod
